mods.abstract: Discussion on politics in country music from the Ford Theatre at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 5, 2002. Hosted by Chris Williams. Panelist include Rodney Crowell; Nanci Griffith; Todd Snider; Bob Titley; Clarence Spalding;

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
